评论概述: Nice and thick material, but a little small

I love these pants. So comfortable an classy. Great stretch and true to size

I did not like the material of the pants
Love these pants. Very long but I have short legs. Fits well the material is great. I plan to buy more in other colors

So comfortable. I am 5’2 and weigh between 195-210 I ordered a XL And it snugs in all the right places ladies!!  Only thing is I am short and these pants are a little longer than I would like but I’m used to it; been a struggle my whole life. Definitely will buy again!
I will be buying more 🤝🏼💞💞💞
I love these, they’re soft and thick but don’t make you hot! The quality is really nice too! The fit is nice but they are a bit long but I’m only 5’3!

These fit true to size! The flare gives it that extra touch and the fabric is so comfortable to wear. I love the waist the way it tucks in any extra and flattens the tummy! These are my new favorites!

These pants are a really comfortable material and they have lots of stretch. They're a good color and I like how long they are. They fold over on top which is perfect for me since I'm 8 months pregnant. The cons for me are 1. They don't have pockets which is a huge bummer. 2. It's too tight. When it comes to how tight they are, they do stretch enough for me to put on, but I purposefully sized up so that it would be stretchy but almost loose. These are difficult to get on! And when they are on, they feel like they're crushing my crotch and thighs. Even being so pregnant, my legs have actually not grown, just my big belly has gotten bigger. And as I said, I did get a size up on purpose. It does make it uncomfortable to use the bathroom; every time I have to put them on or take them off it's more of a pain than I'd like, even though they are super comfortable overall. The lack of pockets is a big deal for me because obviously, I keep my phone with me most of the time, so not being able to do that is a real bummer. So pros and cons...but overall still super stretchy and a great style.

These flared pants are a fantastic blend of style and comfort! The stretch material feels great against the skin, allowing for easy movement during workouts or casual outings. The high waist provides excellent support, and the fold-over ruched design adds a chic touch. They are versatile enough to dress up or down, making them perfect for yoga, lounging, or running errands. Overall, a great addition to my wardrobe that I reach for often!
This are super long and run small. I can't wear them.

I absolutely love the fit of these. They are so flattering. I’m 52 and 115 pounds and I got a small and they’re not too long. The length is perfect and I really love the color but some of the other items in the same color are actually a different shade like I just bought the crop tops three pack and the gray shirt is a little darker than these pants

I like thicker pants so I don't have to worry about them being see through when I bend over working out. These are great for working out or just casual lounge pants. I have a hard time finding pants that are long enough for my legs, I'm 5'9", but these are perfect in length. The size feels accurate to me. These are a tighter style than some yoga pants but I prefer the compression feel over loose ones that bunch up every time you move. I think they look great on as well. Great pants overall and thrilled to have something besides black!

I could literally live in these pants 🤍 they are absolutely perfect! The fold over yoga pant style is back for me ☺️ they are so comfy and stretchy! Good for working out, lounging and everyday wear! I’ll be purchasing these in every color 💕💁🏽‍♀️
It's Thick , Smells Good💋The Material Quality Is Nice It Fits Perfect & It's Stretchy But Not Much🤩I Love It🥰🥰Fits The Body Well Nice❤️❤️

These are definitely a must purchase.  They are true to size . They are great quality . They hold me in very well . Tall girl friendly and the material is thick also very versatile , I will definitely purchase again and recommend.
These pants run very small and fit really tight. They don’t have a lot of stretch to them. They are a thicker fabric than yoga pants usually are. The flare leg is nice though.
This pant are great! It fit perfectly, and stretchy but also fitted. true to size! I love it and highly recommend it 😍🥰

I really like the way these yoga pants fit. They are very form fitting and flattering with the ruched fold over waist. They washed up nicely. They are about 3 inches too long so I'll either hem them up or just rolled them up and wear around the house. They are comfy!

I absolutely love these OQQ Women’s Flared Pants! The high-waist design is super flattering and gives great support, making them perfect for both casual wear and workouts. The stretch material is incredibly comfortable, allowing for easy movement whether I’m doing yoga or just running errands.  One of the best features is the fold-over ruched waistband. It adds a stylish touch and allows you to adjust the fit, so it always feels just right. The flare at the bottom is just the right amount, giving a trendy look without being too much.  I’ve worn these pants for yoga sessions, casual outings, and even for lounging at home, and they’ve been fantastic in every situation. They wash well too, maintaining their shape and color after multiple washes. Overall, these leggings are a versatile addition to any wardrobe, and I highly recommend them!
They are very small sizes. It's transparent fabric and looks cheap, so I put it back.

These pants are super warm, like thermal pants so I'm not sure why they are listed as casual work out pants. I could wear these in the winter with no other pants and be perfectly warm. I like that they flare out. Really good quality.

Those are the two words that immediately came to mind when I tried on the OQQ Flared Fold-Over Ruched Yoga Pants. I had ordered my usual size (XL) after checking the size information in the product description. When I pulled the pants from the package, I was surprised how small the waist and hips were. I thought at first that I had received the wrong size, but they are marked XL. I struggled to get the yoga pants on. Although there is some stretch, it didn't overcome the tightness I felt at my waist, hips and thighs. I couldn't wait to take off these pants. The fabric is much thicker than what I've experienced with other yoga pants. I do, however, like the style with the flared legs and fold-over ruched waistband. These pants simply didn't work out very well for me.

These yoga pants are super flattering! They are ribbed, which make them very comfortable. I love the light coffee color I chose and they fold over on the top which helps hold in my tummy. The fit is very slimming and I love them!

This is a much thicker fabric that I expected. It does have the 4-way stretch but it gets quite tight in the thigh area. I'm used to yoga pants that have a lot of stretch! That being said it is most definitely not see-through, even when stretched to it's max. The fold over waist doesn't curl down or up. Because of the thickness and tightness of the fabric it does offer some "tummy control", not a lot but I'll take what I can get! Seem to be well made & will be nice when it's colder outside.
